dmca.title: Online Mall Shop Gets Evicted
dmca.body:
:::::::CafePress's [Online Mall Owner] letter:::::::

Dear CafePress.com Storeowner, 

In accordance with our Intellectual Property Rights Policy, The Law Offices of Marc Aaron Goldbach, representing 420 Inc./John Rowland, provided us with a notice in which it alleged that the 420 images used in your shop infringes his clients intellectual property rights.  Based on this notice, we removed your Shop from our servers. 

As you know, CafePress.com provides a service which enables independent shopowners to sell various types of merchandise, and we are not in a position to evaluate the merits of infringement claims made against such shopowners by third parties.  However, we will be happy to supply you with the contact information for Mr. Goldbach and his client 420 Inc./John Rowland so you may contact them directly regarding their demands.

We have recently learned that two other parties are currently contesting 420 Inc.
dmca.sender_name: The Law Offices of Marc Aaron Goldbach
